name: Simple Page to Sidebar
author: Steffen Lohaus

sections.description:
Simple Page to Sidebar is a plugin that adds a widget which enables you to display any page content in your sidebars. Just choose any page using the dropdown in the widget area. Also unpublished or private pages content can be shown.

Features

  • No posts, just pages.
  • Internationalized for english and german.
sections.installation:
1. Download this plugin and unzip it.
  2. Upload the whole simple-page-to-sidebar folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Go to your ‘Widget’ section and simply add some pages to your sidebars.
sections.faq:
Can i also add posts to my sidebars?

No, this plugin isnÂ´t meant for that. There are other plugins enabling you to do that.

Can i add unpublished or private page content?

Yes, you can.

short_description: Simple Page to Sidebar lets you simply add page content to a sidebar. No more, no less.
